title: Intro Discrete Math
description: Mathematical logic and proof, mathematical induction, counting methods, recurrence relations, algorithms and complexity, graph theory and graph algorithms. Credit not awarded for both MATH 2603 and MATH 2602.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 1502 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1504 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1555 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 15X2 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T
